text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi "We are at WAR with an invisible enemy", your words, aka CoVID19-
This deadly enemy originated in China, it's "The Chinese Virus"-
The U.S. is currently shut down like never before, facing economic collapse, and the death toll already exceeds the Vietnam War-
USA vs China vs ???
